text: kya tumane dekha nahin ki dharatee mein jo kuchh bhee hai use allaah ne tumhaare lie vasheebhoot kar rakha hai aur nauka ko bhee ki usake aadesh se dariya mein chalatee hai, aur usane aakaash ko dharatee par girane se rok rakha hai. usakee anugya ho to baat doosaree hai. nissandeh allaah logon ke haq mein bada karunaasheel, dayaavaan hai
